short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redesign Barstool Sportsbook more lines are viewable at once

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the large header and navigation bar on Barstool Sportsbook so that you can more games at the same time without scrolling. Finding a particular line or prop can be very difficult when you only have a very small amount of screen real estate to view the betting lines. With this extension, you'll free up much more space to view all the games or lines for a particular game.
